ComicInfo.Summary:
With the new space vampire hybrid threat, Katie must seek help from her sworn enemy… Zombie Tramp! But they also need the help of another unlikely ally… DollFace!!
This Danger Doll Squad tie-in features 3 covers (regular, artist, and 90s style), each with a risqué variant as well!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Marcelo Trom | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Trom | 4 | E | 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Ben Hansen | 5 | F | Risqué 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Ben Hansen | 6 | Note: Overall issue #19.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/vampblade-season-2-6-the-road-to-danger-doll-squad/4000-617481/
ComicInfo.Title: The Road To Danger Doll Squad Part One
